update coupon_user
coupon_template_id = #{couponTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select
from coupon_user
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and min_cost <= #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER} and coupon_status = 'notUse'

select c.value, c.create_time receive_time, c.coupon_name, c.coupon_pic_key, c.disabled_pic_key, u.nick_name, u.mobile, u.profile_pic_key from coupon_user as c left join user_base u on c.user_id = u.user_id
where c.share_user_id = #{shareUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.coupon_template_id = #{couponTemplateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by c.create_time desc
